team_0100_cassiopeia_01: I see you’re almost at the fifth base...[npcn:9]
team_0100_cassiopeia_02:
Holed up inside there is Team Star’s last
remaining squad.[npcn:9]
team_0100_cassiopeia_03:
You’ve fought well to make it this far.
Thank you, [trnm:0].[npcn:9]
team_0100_cassiopeia_04: So you made it as well, Clive.[npcn:9]
team_0100_nelke_02:
Of course—it’s the last base! I wouldn’t want to
miss out on the action![npcn:1E]
team_0100_cassiopeia_05:
Clive...I owe you my thanks. Your help has been
invaluable to the operation.\c
I’m sorry I was so wary of you at first...[npcn:9]
team_0100_nelke_03:
Well...that’s all water under the bridge.\c
When we’re finished with this base, will that be
the end of Operation Starfall, then?[npcn:1E]
team_0100_cassiopeia_06:
Not quite. We’ll still need to handle Team Star’s
secret mastermind last of all.[npcn:9]
team_0100_nelke_04: Do we have any leads on how to find them?[npcn:1E]
team_0100_cassiopeia_07:
I’m hoping they’ll come out into the open once
all the squad bosses have stepped down.[npcn:9]
team_0100_cassiopeia_08:
We’ve come so far. Only a few more steps left...
Don’t let me down, either of you.[npcn:9]
team_0100_nelke_07:
[BD06:0]Thanks to you, [trnm:0], I’ve
slowly\r
but\r
surely\r
come\r
to\r
understand Team Star.[npcn:1E]
team_0100_nelke_08:
I know what I need to do... And I know what my
final decision will be...[npcn:1E]
team_0100_nelke_09:
For that, I can’t thank you enough. Take care in
that base, M[aster;iss:g] [trnm:0]!\c
...Ah. Sorry for getting all polite there. Don’t
know what came over me.[npcn:1E]
